text: Do you know about Save the Children?
I have not heard of this charity before! Have you?
I have.I actually a  monthly donor
That's great! Would you mind explaining what the charity does?
The charity collects donation from people like you and me and help children in need
Sounds like quite the worthy cause. Are the children in need all across the world? Or just the United States?
all over the world.I saw a children died from hunger and it tears my heart apart.I decide to be part of the solution since then
Wow, that is extremely sad. It is extremely unfortunate that child hunger is so prevalent in this world.
Save the Children organization is a blessing to the world.They have been helping children,finding houses and food.
It really sounds like a blessing! What is their website? I'd like to learn more information.
URL Specially in countries at war children are helpless.
Great, thank you! Is there a monetary goal set for the year?
NO.It is not.You can donate as much as you want
That is amazing.
How much money do you spend on candies that can be helping children in need?
I do not purchase candy too often; however, I could definitely sacrifice a Starbucks Coffee to help children in need.
Please do that.Children need your help
Yes, most definitely. Thanks for making me aware of this charity!
How much do you like to donate today?
I'll look into the website and likely donate $5.
